item.title: Of beauty, sex, and power: statistical challenges in estimating small effects
item.description: A Gelman, D Weakliem “Of beauty, sex, and power: statistical challenges in estimating small effects” (2009) // American Scientist. Publisher: Sigma Xi. Vol. 97. No 4. Pp. 310.
